alert.note: Alert for Dutchess; Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 10:31AM EST until January 10 at 7:06PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Hudson River near Poughkeepsie. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 4.2 feet, minor flood stage. Minor flooding of lowlands, boat docks and boat launches. Water covers State Route 213 in Eddyville. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 5.1 feet. - Forecast...The river will crest around 5.2 feet late this morning and will begin falling through the afternoon. - Flood stage is 4.2 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Hudson River Poughkeepsie Flood Stage: 4.2 Observed Stage at Wed 9 am: 5.1 Forecast: Wed 4 pm 1.1 Wed 10 pm -0.7 Thu 4 am -2.2 Thu 10 am 1.4 Thu 4 pm 1.4 Thu 10 pm 0.1 Fri 4 am -1.1 Fri 10 am 0.3 Fri 4 pm 1.6 Fri 10 pm 0.3 Sat 4 am 2.2 &&
